  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(int id, String text, String studentId)
      The default constructor for a Question. It sets the question ID, text, and student ID.

    • Question

      public Question(int id, String text, String studentId, Integer parentQuestionId)
      The constructor for a Question. It sets the question ID, text, student ID, resolved status, parent question ID and creates a new keywords ArrayList for the question.

      public String getStudentId()
      Returns the associated student ID.

      studentId the ID of the student associated with question

    • isResolved

      public boolean isResolved()
      Returns whether the question is resolved or not.
      Returns:
      isResolved the resolved boolean value

    • setResolved

      public void setResolved(boolean resolved)
      Sets the isResolved boolean value.
      Parameters:
      resolved - true or false value that represents whether question is resolved or not

    • getParentQuestionId

      public Integer getParentQuestionId()
      Returns the parent question ID.
      Returns:
      parentQuestionId the ID of the parent question to the current question

    • setParentQuestionId

      public void setParentQuestionId(Integer parentQuestionId)
      Sets the parent question ID.
      Parameters:
      parentQuestionId - the ID of the parent question to be associated with current question
